text: oh inu anthu okhulupirira! onetsetsani kuti pamene mupita kukamenya nkhondo m’njira ya Mulungu, kuti musanene kwa iwo amene akhulupirira kuti ndi osakhulupirira pofuna kuti mupeze katundu wosakhalitsa wa mdziko lino. Kwa Mulungu kuli zinthu zambiri zabwino. Monga mmene iye ali, nanunso mudali wosakhulupirira m’masiku adzana koma tsopano Mulungu wakupatsani chisomo chake pokutsogolerani ku njira yoyenera. Kotero musachite tsankho! Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa zonse zimene mumachita
